info.name: Google Groups Dark
info.description: Dark style for Google Groups Hosted with ♥ at GitHub
info.additionalInfo:
Version 2018-06-11
 - gb_Eg -> .gb_Qf

Version 2018-01-04
 - .gb_Ef -> .gb_Eg.

Version 2017-12-28
 - This message has been deleted.
 - Fix default colour for all headings.

Version 2017-12-27
 - Fix links (invisible before).
 - Fix welcome white box.

Version 2017-12-21
- Use dark background from StackExchange.
- Reuse search bar customisation from Gmail Dark #1.
- Fix everything else.
